name: Reload-browser
body:
A programmatic way to press the refresh button (or hit f5). From the terminal just run:

```
$ reload-browser
```

and the foremost tab/window will reload. To reload every time a file changes combine with a file watcher like [wach](https://github.com/quackingduck/wach):

```
$ wach "make index.html && reload-browser"
```
tagline: A command line utility to reload the active browser tab
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
